source.name: Colorado Plateau Rapid Ecoregion Assessment Management Question A2: Where are sensitive soils (including saline, sodic, gypsiferous, shallow, low water holding capacity)?
source.description: This map shows the location of sensitive soils, which were extracted from SSURGO and STATSGO soil datasets.
